description: Some notes on the research phase

children.nginx config: As far as I can tell, the https request can be rerouted to a pm2 http server serving the build of the react app. This can be done from the same nginx config as the backend so they share a common certificate.

things I didn't previously know.aws amplify: Just point at a public github repo

app design.very basic: I used patterns I previously knew such as redux-saga for requests. I should try out new patterns I have in mind, such as the queries model. I have to think about this in terms of the redux efficiency updating stuff, keeping in mind the problems discovered while building my work application.

stuff to look up.contexts: How do react contexts update data associated with them?
